      public ClientRMIImpl(Server s, boolean gui) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new `ClientRMIImpl` object with the specified server and GUI flag.
      Parameters:
      s - the `Server` object representing the server
      gui - a boolean flag indicating whether to use a graphical user interface (GUI)
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

      Parameters:
      s - the `Server` object representing the server
      port - the port number for RMI communication
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error

      Parameters:
      s - the `Server` object representing the server
      port - the port number for RMI communication
      csf - the client socket factory
      ssf - the server socket factory

      RemoteException - if there is a remote communication error
